title: Daily Routine Sentences for Housewives
content: Hello everyone Aaj hum seekhenge daily routine sentences jo housewives apni family members se present indefinite tense mein baat karne ke liye use kar sakti hain. This video will help you express your daily activities in a simple and effective way.
narration: Hello everyone Aaj hum seekhenge daily routine sentences jo housewives apni family members se present indefinite tense mein baat karne ke liye use kar sakti hain. This video will help you express your daily activities in a simple and effective way.

title: What is Present Indefinite Tense?
content:
Used for habitual actions.
Describes routines and facts.
Verb in base form (or adds -s/-es for he/she/it).
image_desc: Grammar rules present indefinite tense. Type: infographic
narration: Present indefinite tense humesha hone wale actions ke liye use hota hai. It describes routines habits aur general facts. Remember verb apne base form mein rahega but agar subject 'he' 'she' ya 'it' hai toh verb mein 's' ya 'es' add hoga.

title: Morning Routine
content:
I wake up at six am.
I make tea for everyone.
I prepare breakfast.
narration: Chaliye dekhte hain morning routine ke kuch sentences. I wake up at 6 am matlab main subah 6 baje uthti hoon. I make tea for everyone ka matlab hai main sabke liye chai banati hoon. And I prepare breakfast means main nashta banati hoon.

title: Household Chores
content:
I clean the house every day.
I wash the clothes.
I iron the clothes.
narration: Ab dekhte hain household chores ke sentences. I clean the house every day ka matlab hai main har roz ghar saaf karti hoon. I wash the clothes means main kapde dhoti hoon. And I iron the clothes means main kapde press karti hoon.

title: Cooking and Meal Times
content:
I cook lunch at noon.
We eat lunch together.
I prepare dinner in the evening.
narration: Cooking aur meal times ke sentences dekhte hain. I cook lunch at noon ka matlab hai main dopahar mein lunch banati hoon. We eat lunch together means hum sab saath mein lunch karte hain. And I prepare dinner in the evening means main shaam ko dinner banati hoon.

title: Taking Care of Children
content:
I help my children with their homework.
I take my children to school.
I play with my children.
image_desc: Mother helping child with homework. Type: illustration
narration: Bachchon ki dekhbhal ke sentences dekhte hain. I help my children with their homework ka matlab hai main apne bachchon ko homework mein help karti hoon. I take my children to school means main apne bachchon ko school le jaati hoon. And I play with my children means main apne bachchon ke saath khelti hoon.

title: Evening Activities
content:
I watch television for an hour.
I talk to my husband.
I read a book sometimes.
narration: Evening activities ke sentences dekhte hain. I watch television for an hour ka matlab hai main ek ghante ke liye television dekhti hoon. I talk to my husband means main apne husband se baat karti hoon. And I read a book sometimes means main kabhi kabhi kitaab padhti hoon.

title: Night Routine
content:
I prepare dinner for the family.
I wash the dishes.
I go to bed at 10 pm.
narration: Night routine ke sentences dekhte hain. I prepare dinner for the family ka matlab hai main family ke liye dinner banati hoon. I wash the dishes means main bartan dhoti hoon. And I go to bed at ten PM means main raat ko das baje sone jaati hoon.

title: Using "He/She/It"
content:
She cooks delicious food. (She)
He helps with the groceries. (He)
It rains a lot in monsoon. (It)
narration: Agar subject 'he' 'she' ya 'it' hai toh verb mein 's' ya 'es' add hoga. For example She cooks delicious food. He helps with the groceries. And It rains a lot in monsoon.

title: More Examples
content:
My husband works in an office.
My daughter studies in college.
My son plays cricket.
image_desc: Man working in office. Type: illustration
narration: Kuch aur examples dekhte hain. My husband works in an office matlab mere husband office mein kaam karte hain. My daughter studies in college means meri beti college mein padhti hai. And My son plays cricket means mera beta cricket khelta hai.

title: Practice Time!
content:
Try making your own sentences.
Talk about your daily routine.
Use present indefinite tense.
narration: Ab practice karne ka time hai Try kijiye apne khud ke sentences banane ki. Apni daily routine ke baare mein baat kijiye. Aur present indefinite tense ka use karna mat bhooliye.

title: Conclusion
content: Keep practicing and you'll become fluent!
narration: Keep practicing aur aap jald hi fluent ho jayenge Remember practice makes perfect. Dhanyavaad
